hadiths.text: Abu Zubair reported that he saw Jabir b. 'Abdullah praying in a single garment crossing Its ends even though he had the garments, and Jabir said:He saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) doing like this

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي ثَوْبٍ وَاحِدٍ وَصِفَةِ لُبْسِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Praying In A Single Garment, And How It Should Be Worn
